75-152.Common carriers; consignor; designation of means and routing of shipment.

When transportation is involved in connection with the sale of personal property and the price at which such personal property is sold is a delivered price at destination, the consignor may determine the means of transportation to be used and the routing of the shipment.

SourceLaws 1965, c. 444, ยง 1, p. 1413;Laws 1994, LB 414, ยง 63.
